tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Vanuatu is known for its diverse culture, with over 80 distinct ethnic groups, each contributing unique customs, languages, and traditional practices.

tidbits.title: Volcanic Archipelago
tidbits.description: The country is an archipelago of volcanic islands, offering dramatic landscapes, active volcanoes like Mount Yasur on Tanna, and pristine natural beauty.

tidbits.title: Customary Land Ownership
tidbits.description: Vanuatu holds a unique land tenure system where much of the land is owned by indigenous communities, preserving traditional land practices and customs.
